entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 11:10 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: NW 33 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
